resources.string: Persistent MAC address\n(does not change after reboot)
Locked Wi-Fi compatibility\n(use at your own risk)
Before proceeding it is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you write down the REAL MAC ADDRESS of the interface. The application will try to remember it, but there is NO GUARANTEE THAT IT WILL!
I have written down my real MAC Address
Reset MAC address to the default value?
This method is not compatible with your device (either a supported network interface is not available or your device is not supported yet).

Make sure that you reset your MAC address to the default value before uninstalling the application.
The MAC address failed to change! Please try some different address.
You do not seem to have a rooted device.\nExiting…
You do not seem to have busybox installed.\nExiting…
You seem to have denied root access.\nExiting…
* only tested on Samsung Galaxy S3 mini
